title: The Fate of Freddy Mitchell
description: When the Fates of the Underworld fail to capture young Freddy Mitchell's soul at his scheduled time of death, the very fabric of the universe begins to unravel. While the Fates scramble to correct their mistake, Freddy is forced to deal with a chatty crow, dark and sinister creatures hunting him through the night, a murderous group of soul hunters, and the fact that he no longer appears to be as alive as he used to be.
author: Andrew Buckley
